post1.title: About C language !
post1.text: C is a general-purpose, procedural computer programming language supporting structured programming, lexical variable scope, and recursion, with a static type system.It was designed and developed by Dennis Ritchie in 1972 to 1972.

post2.title: Variable Types in C / C++
post2.text: char, signed char, unsigned char, short, int, long int , long long int

post3.title: Why c++ is better then c ?
post3.text: we get some extra headers in c++ which is not supported in c. with this headers we can perform many complex tasks easily. besides that all the headers of c is supported in c++. for this reasons, c++ is better then c
